summary: Implement and fix the "Create My Public Profile" flow so the button opens a profile creation form and redirects to the user's public profile page after creation.
architectural_notes: "Create My Public Profile" CTA should navigate to a profile creation form; on successful submit, redirect to the newly created public profile page.
known_issues: "Create My Public Profile" button currently does nothing when clicked on the "No Public Profiles Yet" screen.

existing_features.title: Fix the “Create My Public Profile” button on the “No Public Profiles Yet” empty state so that clicking it reliably navigates the authenticated user to their own profile route in edit mode (opening the profile creation form).

Update the profile page logic so that when the authenticated user navigates to their own profile with `edit=true` and no profile exists yet, the page shows the EditProfilePanel (profile creation form) immediately instead of showing the intermediate “Create Your Profile” empty state.

Ensure that after successfully saving a newly created profile from the profile creation form, the app redirects the user to their profile page view (non-edit mode) so they can see the created profile.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix "Create My Public Profile" button: open profile creation form and redirect to user's profile page after successful creation

projectName: Fix “Create My Public Profile” button to open profile creation form and redirect to profile page
